name: Aeon's Oddity
description:
The protagonist arrives at home after a long shift on a friday night, the player is tasked with making dinner before the go to bed as a tutorial on how the game works, Whilst the player sleeps somthing strange happens, and when the player wakes up they find that a Aeon's ring has been embedded into the wall, cracking it, The player is left to solve the mysteries behind this contraption, eventually turning it on leading to the credits.

Controls

W,A,S,D - Move

Right Click - Pick up

Left Click - Interact/Throw

C - Crouch
